segment.source: WinPE Network Drivers: Initializing and adding drivers
segment.target: WinPE Network Drivers: Initializing and adding drivers

segment.source: WinPE Network Drivers: Initializing and adding drivers
segment.target: WinPE Network Drivers: Initializing and adding drivers

segment.source: WinPE Network Drivers: Initializing and adding drivers
segment.target: WinPE Network Drivers: Initializing and adding drivers

segment.source: The Wpeutil command initializes the Windows PE (WinPE) network drivers as soon as WinPE boots.
segment.target: The Wpeutil command initializes the Windows PE (WinPE) network drivers as soon as WinPE boots.

segment.source: The default WinPE image includes support for many popular network adapters, and supports many of the same networking commands as in Windows.Windows PE includes a basic set of network drivers for many popular network adapters, and supports many of the same networking commands as in Windows.
segment.target: The default WinPE image includes support for many popular network adapters, and supports many of the same networking commands as in Windows.Windows PE includes a basic set of network drivers for many popular network adapters, and supports many of the same networking commands as in Windows.

segment.source: The supported methods of connecting to file servers are TCP/IP and NetBIOS over TCP/IP.
segment.target: The supported methods of connecting to file servers are TCP/IP and NetBIOS over TCP/IP.

segment.source: Windows PE doesn't support other methods, like the Internetwork Packet Exchange/Sequenced Packet Exchange (IPX/SPX) network protocol.
segment.target: Windows PE doesn't support other methods, like the Internetwork Packet Exchange/Sequenced Packet Exchange (IPX/SPX) network protocol.

segment.source: Windows PE supports Distributed File System (DFS) name resolution for stand-alone namespaces only.
segment.target: Windows PE supports Distributed File System (DFS) name resolution for stand-alone namespaces only.

segment.source: It doesn't support domain namespaces.
segment.target: It doesn't support domain namespaces.

segment.source: Stand-alone DFS namespaces allow for a DFS namespace that exists only on the local PC and therefore doesn't use Active Directory® Domain Services (AD DS).
segment.target: Stand-alone DFS namespaces allow for a DFS namespace that exists only on the local PC and therefore doesn't use Active Directory® Domain Services (AD DS).

segment.source: Connecting to an IPv4 network from Windows PE on an IPv6 network is not supported.
segment.target: Connecting to an IPv4 network from Windows PE on an IPv6 network is not supported.

segment.source: To connect to another PC or shared folder on a network
segment.target: To connect to another PC or shared folder on a network

segment.source: While in Windows PE, you can connect (or map) to a shared network folder by using the net use command.
segment.target: While in Windows PE, you can connect (or map) to a shared network folder by using the net use command.

segment.source: If you’re connecting to a domain-joined PC, Windows PE prompts for a username and password.
segment.target: If you’re connecting to a domain-joined PC, Windows PE prompts for a username and password.

segment.source: You can also host Windows PE from a network by using Preboot Execution Environment (PXE), which is part of Windows Deployment Services.
segment.target: You can also host Windows PE from a network by using Preboot Execution Environment (PXE), which is part of Windows Deployment Services.

segment.source: Troubleshooting networking problems
segment.target: Troubleshooting networking problems

segment.source: Try adding a driver for your network device.
segment.target: Try adding a driver for your network device.

segment.source: We recommend WinPE: Mount and Customize, especially for any driver that requires a reboot during the installation process.
segment.target: We recommend WinPE: Mount and Customize, especially for any driver that requires a reboot during the installation process.

segment.source: You may also be able to use the Drvload Command-Line Options to load some drivers while Windows PE is running.
segment.target: You may also be able to use the Drvload Command-Line Options to load some drivers while Windows PE is running.

segment.source: However, any updates made to the registry during the installation process will not persist after a reboot, even when Windows PE is running in a WinPE: Install on a Hard Drive (Flat Boot or Non-RAM).
segment.target: However, any updates made to the registry during the installation process will not persist after a reboot, even when Windows PE is running in a WinPE: Install on a Hard Drive (Flat Boot or Non-RAM).

segment.source: Run Wpeinit and Startnet.cmd: Using WinPE Startup Scripts to initialize the network.
segment.target: Run Wpeinit and Startnet.cmd: Using WinPE Startup Scripts to initialize the network.

segment.source: By default, wpeinit runs when Windows PE starts.
segment.target: By default, wpeinit runs when Windows PE starts.

segment.source: In some cases, you may need to configure firewall settings on the PC that you are trying to connect to.
segment.target: In some cases, you may need to configure firewall settings on the PC that you are trying to connect to.

segment.source: Windows PE supports IPSec configuration.
segment.target: Windows PE supports IPSec configuration.

segment.source: Note, you cannot join Windows PE to a domain, or run Windows PE as a server.
segment.target: Note, you cannot join Windows PE to a domain, or run Windows PE as a server.

segment.source: For more information, see WinPE for Windows 10.
segment.target: For more information, see WinPE for Windows 10.

segment.source: To connect to a wired network using 802.1x authentication protocols
segment.target: To connect to a wired network using 802.1x authentication protocols

segment.target: Create a custom Windows PE image that includes the WinPE-Dot3Svc optional component.

segment.target: Boot a PC to Windows PE.

segment.source: Start the dot3svc service.
segment.target: Start the dot3svc service.
